sentence.Network_en: The same drug substance may also exist in a noncrystalline ( amorphous ) form.

sentence.Network_en: Devitrification. The process in which a glass ( noncrystalline or vitreous solid ) transforms to a crystalline solid.
sentence.Network_cn: 玻璃 ( 非晶的或玻璃质固体 ) 转变为晶体的一种工艺.
